import React , {useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector , useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import logo from '../../assets/logo.png' import search from '../../assets/search.svg' import Avatar from '../../components/Avatar/Avatar' import './navbar.css' const navbar = () => { const dispatch= useDispatch() var User= useSelector((state)=> (state.currentUserReducer)) useEffect(() => { dispatch(setCurrentUser(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('Profile')))) }, [dispatch]) return (
About Production For Items
< img src={search} alt='search' height='15' width='20' className='search-icon'/>
{User===null ? Log in : <> R }
) } export default navbar ;
